channel.title: Staff Crowns
channel.description:
I'm looking for Staff Crowns that are ready to be used. Don't hate saying that i should do it myself, trust me, ive tried alot of things. I would appreciate normal RS crowns (gold & silver), but if you have decent custom crowns then they will do aswell.
By the way, yes ive seen alot of topics showing so many staff crowns, but whenever i try to use it the background is either white or black.

item.title: Staff Crowns
item.dc:creator: @562-Pro 562-Pro
item.description:
@562-Pro wrote:

i think i have the same problem.
im useing a 562 source and client and i have made myself owner, (rights 3)
i have all owner rights and the contol panel works
but i dont have a crown next to my name when i talk can someone help?

Read full topic
